name: Baked lemon-herb chicken with quinoa and broccoli
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season chicken breasts with lemon juice and herbs.
Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Steam broccoli until tender.
Serve the chicken with quinoa and broccoli.

name: Grilled salmon with sweet potatoes and asparagus
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with olive oil and salt.
Grill salmon for 5-7 minutes per side.
Peel and chop sweet potatoes, then roast at 400°F for 25 minutes.
Grill asparagus for 5-7 minutes.
Serve salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and grilled asparagus.

name: Chickpea vegetable curry with rice
directions: Cook rice as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté carrots and peas until tender.
Add chickpeas, spinach, and coconut milk.
Stir in curry powder and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve curry with rice.

name: Lentil bolognese with pasta and zucchini
directions: Cook pasta as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onion and zucchini.
Add lentils and crushed tomatoes, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the bolognese over pasta.

name: Beef stir-fry with noodles and bell peppers
directions: Cook noodles as per package instructions.
Stir-fry beef strips with garlic until browned.
Add bell peppers and stir-fry for another 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
Serve stir-fry over noodles.

name: Vegetable tofu stir-fry with cauliflower rice
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (e.g. carrots, peas, bell peppers)
directions: Stir-fry tofu until golden brown.
Add mixed vegetables and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in cauliflower rice and cook until tender.
Serve the stir-fry hot.

name: Grilled chicken with roasted vegetables and brown rice
directions: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Season chicken breasts with olive oil, paprika, and garlic powder.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Chop carrots, bell peppers, and zucchini and toss with olive oil.
Roast vegetables in the oven at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes until tender.
Serve the grilled chicken with roasted vegetables and brown rice.

name: Salmon with quinoa and spinach
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season salmon fillets with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Bake salmon in the oven for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Sauté spinach in a pan with olive oil until wilted.
Serve the salmon with quinoa and sautéed spinach.

name: Chicken stir-fry with broccoli and bell peppers
directions: Slice chicken breasts into strips.
Heat sesame oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add chicken strips and cook until browned.
Add broccoli and bell peppers and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and continue to cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve the stir-fry as is or with cauliflower rice.

name: Beef and vegetable kebabs with couscous
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Thread beef cubes, bell peppers, and onions onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil and season with cumin, paprika, and lemon juice.
Grill kebabs for 10-12 minutes until beef is cooked to your desired doneness.
Cook couscous according to package instructions.
Serve the kebabs with couscous.

name: Eggplant and lentil curry
directions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Dice eggplant and sauté in a pan with garlic and onion.
Add curry powder and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add lentils, coconut milk, and diced tomatoes to the pan.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes until lentils are tender.
Serve the curry over rice.

name: Finger food
directions: Bake everything in the oven.

name: Tofu stir-fry with mixed vegetables and noodles
directions: Press tofu to remove excess moisture and slice into cubes.
Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Heat sesame oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add tofu cubes and cook until golden brown.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and continue to cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve the stir-fry with noodles.

name: Classic Cheeseburger with Fries
directions: Grill beef patties over medium heat for 4–5 minutes on each side, adding cheddar cheese for the last minute.
Toast the burger buns.
Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, pickles, mayonnaise, and ketchup.
Cut potatoes into fries, fry them in hot oil until golden, and season with salt.
Serve the cheeseburgers with fries on the side.

name: Loaded Nachos
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray and layer with cheese, ground beef, black beans, and tomatoes.
Bake for 5–7 minutes until the cheese melts.
Top with sour cream, guacamole, jalapeños, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

name: Mac and Cheese
directions: Cook macaroni according to package instructions.
In a saucepan, melt butter and stir in flour to make a roux.
Gradually whisk in milk and cook until thickened.
Add cheddar, mozzarella, garlic powder, and paprika; stir until melted.
Combine the cheese sauce with cooked macaroni and serve hot.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
directions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Spread marinara sauce over the pizza crust.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and top with pepperoni slices.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle oregano on top.
Bake for 12–15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.

name: Lemon Garlic Chicken with Spinach and Couscous
directions: Cook couscous as per package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in lemon juice and spinach until wilted.
Serve the chicken with couscous and spinach.

name: Veggie-Packed Chili
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot, sauté onion and bell peppers.
Add beans, diced tomatoes, and chili powder.
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
directions: Grill or pan-fry chicken breasts.
Chop lettuce and toss with Caesar dressing.
Slice chicken and add to salad with croutons and parmesan.
Serve immediately.

name: Quinoa-Stuffed Bell Peppers
directions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Cut the tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Mix quinoa, diced tomatoes, black beans, and cumin.
Stuff the peppers with the mixture and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti with Lentil Marinara
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent.
Add lentils and crushed tomatoes, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve lentil marinara over pasta.

name: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan and cook beef strips until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir to combine.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Veggie Fajitas
directions: Season chicken with fajita seasoning and cook in a pan.
Sauté bell peppers and onions until tender.
Warm tortillas and fill with chicken and vegetables.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
directions: Roast sweet potatoes at 400°F for 40 minutes.
Sauté spinach until wilted and mix with black beans and cumin.
Cut sweet potatoes open and stuff with spinach and bean mixture.
Top with sour cream and serve.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
directions: Slice eggplant and bread it with breadcrumbs.
Fry until golden and place in a baking dish.
Top with marinara sauce and cheeses.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
directions: Sauté zucchini noodles in olive oil for 2-3 minutes.
Toss with pesto and top with parmesan.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Skewers
directions: Thread chicken and vegetables onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil and lemon juice.
Grill for 10-12 minutes until cooked through.
Serve hot.

name: Mushroom and Spinach Risotto
directions: Cook arborio rice in vegetable broth until creamy.
Sauté mushrooms and spinach until tender.
Stir in mushrooms, spinach, and parmesan.
Serve hot.

name: Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Vegetables
directions: Roast pork at 375°F for 25 minutes.
Toss vegetables with olive oil and roast for 20 minutes.
Serve pork with roasted vegetables.

name: Zücher Geschnetzeltes with Pasta
ingredients: 500g veal or chicken breast, sliced into strips
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a large pan, heat vegetable oil over medium heat and sauté the sliced veal or chicken until browned.
Add onion and garlic to the pan and cook until softened.
Stir in flour and paprika, cook for 1-2 minutes.
Pour in white wine, stirring constantly, and cook for 3-4 minutes until slightly reduced.
Add the heavy cream, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 5-7 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Serve the Zücher Geschnetzeltes over the cooked pasta, garnished with parsley.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove chicken and set aside. In the same pot, add diced carrots, celery, and onions. Cook for 5 minutes.
Add cubed potatoes, chicken broth, thyme, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until vegetables are tender.
Shred the chicken and return it to the soup. Simmer for another 5 minutes before serving.

name: Lentil Soup
directions: Rinse the lentils and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add diced onions, carrots, and celery. Cook for 5 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes, cumin, turmeric, salt, and pepper. Stir well.
Add lentils and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, until lentils are tender.
Blend part of the soup with an immersion blender for a creamier texture, or serve as is.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add diced onions and garlic and cook for 5 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes, vegetable broth, basil, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Blend the soup with an immersion blender until smooth.
Stir in cream if desired, then serve hot.

name: Beef and Barley Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Brown the beef stew meat on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove beef and set aside. Add diced carrots, celery, and onion to the pot and cook for 5 minutes.
Add barley, beef broth, thyme, bay leaves, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 1 hour, or until beef and barley are tender.
Remove bay leaves and serve hot.
